#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int dp[5005][5005][4][2];
string s;
int n, m;
#define mod 1000000007
int rec(int i, int no, int subs, bool f) {
	if(subs > 3) return 0;
	
	if(i == n) {
		if(subs == 3 && no >= m)  {
			return 1;	
		}
		return 0;
	}
	if(dp[i][no][subs][f] != -1) return dp[i][no][subs][f];
	int ans = 0;
	if(f) {
		ans += rec(i + 1, no + (s[i] == 'a'), subs, 1);
		ans %= mod;
		ans += rec(i + 1, no + (s[i] == 'a'), subs + 1, 1);
		ans %= mod;
		ans += rec(i + 1, no, subs, 0);
		ans %= mod;
	} else {
	
		ans += rec(i + 1, no + (s[i] == 'a'), subs + 1, 1);
		ans %= mod;
		ans += rec(i + 1, no, subs, 0);
		ans %= mod;
	}
	return dp[i][no][subs][f] = ans;

}
int main() {
	int t, i, j, k, l;
	cin >> t;
	while (t--) {
	
		cin >> s;
		cin >> m;
		n = s.length();
		for(i = 0; i < n; i++) {
			for(j = 0; j < n; j++) {
				for(k = 0; k < 4; k++) {
					for(l = 0; l < 2; l++) {
						dp[i][j][k][l] = -1;
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		cout << rec(0, 0, 0, 0) << endl;
	}
	
	return 0;
}
